title: Bug 70619compiler aborts with "conflicting dominates orders" with circular declare precedences
description: The following program causes ajc 1.2 to abort:public class Conflict { public static void main(String[] args) { } }aspect Conflict1 {declare precedence: Conflict1, Conflict2;before(): execution( (..)) { }}aspect Conflict2 {declare precedence: Conflict2, Conflict1;after(): execution( (..)) { }}
